info.title: Schema of Resources events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Resources events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

ResourceActionCancelEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceActionCancel event. This is raised when a resource action operation is canceled.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

authorization.description: The requested authorization for the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.

ResourceActionFailureEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceActionFailure event. This is raised when a resource action operation fails.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

authorization.description: The requested authorization for the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.

ResourceActionSuccessEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceActionSuccess event. This is raised when a resource action operation succeeds.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

authorization.description: The requested authorization for the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.

ResourceAuthorization.description: The details of the authorization for the resource.

ResourceDeleteCancelEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceDeleteCancel event. This is raised when a resource delete operation is canceled.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

authorization.description: The requested authorization for the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.

ResourceDeleteFailureEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceDeleteFailure event. This is raised when a resource delete operation fails.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.

ResourceDeleteSuccessEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceDeleteSuccess event. This is raised when a resource delete operation succeeds.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

authorization.description: The requested authorization for the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.

ResourceHttpRequest.description: The details of the HTTP request.

url.description: The url used in the request.

ResourceWriteCancelEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.Resources.ResourceWriteCancel event. This is raised when a resource create or update operation is canceled.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group of the resource.

resourceProvider.description: The resource provider performing the operation.

resourceUri.description: The URI of the resource in the operation.

correlationId.description: An operation ID used for troubleshooting.
